name: luling-dict-ce
content_security_policy: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' http://localhost:3000 http://localhost:3000 http://openapi.youdao.com/   'unsafe-eval'; connect-src http://localhost:3000 http://localhost:3000 http://openapi.youdao.com/; style-src * 'unsafe-inline' 'self' blob:; img-src 'self' data:; media-src http://dict.youdao.com/
